item.title: AATIP Closed
item.description: End of AATIP funding and operations https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Aerospace_Threat_Identification_Program

item.title: UAPTF Established
item.description: Initiation of UAP Task Force. Largely replaces / continues work of AATIP. https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unidentified_Aerial_Phenomena_Task_Force
